plays.text: Penalty to Georges Laraque 2 minutes for Elbowing Jesse Wallin
Penalty to Mike Comrie 2 minutes for Tripping Jesse Wallin
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille unassisted
Penalty to Jesse Wallin 2 minutes for High Sticking Ales Hemsky
Penalty to Brett Hull 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Steve Staios assisted by Todd Marchant and Shawn Horcoff
Goal scored by Anson Carter assisted by Ryan Smyth and Ales Pisa
Goal scored by Jason Woolley assisted by Brett Hull and Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for High Sticking Jason Smith
Goal scored by Ryan Smyth assisted by Mike York and Ales Hemsky
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Jason Woolley
Penalty to Janne Niinimaa 2 minutes for Hooking Darren McCarty
Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Mike York
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Holding Mike Comrie
Penalty to Eric Brewer 2 minutes for High Sticking Chris Chelios
Goal scored by Janne Niinimaa assisted by Ethan Moreau and Todd Marchant
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan unassisted
Goal scored by Jason Smith assisted by Mike Comrie and Anson Carter
